text: Drew Allison Carey (born May 23, 1958) is an American actor, comedian and game show host. He gained fame when starring in his own sitcom, The Drew Carey Show. He is the current host of the game show The Price is Right. He is an owner of Seattle Sounders FC, a professional soccer team. == References == ==Other websites== * * Drew Carey's blog * Category:1958 births Category:Actors from Cleveland Category:American game show hosts Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from Cleveland Category:Living people Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Drew Carey
